name: Union Pétrolière Européenne Indépendante
goal:
The function of UPEI within Europe is:

to ensure equitable trading conditions for our members
to promote a competitive market
to encourage efficiency of fuel supply, retailing and consumption
to represent the views of our members to European policy-makers
to secure equal and equitable treatment for our members in the formulation of laws and regulations (taxes, security stock regulations, quality standards, biofuel mandates etc.)
to increase the diversity of supply by region and supplier
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Fraud prevention, Institutional affairs, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Energy Union
- European Green Deal
- Energy Efficiency and energy Efficiency in Buildings Directives
- Fuels Quality Directive
- Energy taxation Directive
- Renewable Energy Directive
- Compulsory Oil Stocks
- Sustainable transport, urban mobility, deployment of alternative fuels infrastructure
- Service Payments Directive and fuel cards
